DataElement.preferredName: Smoking Or Chewing Tobacco History Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not there was a history of smoking or chewing tobacco use.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Smoking Or Chewing Tobacco History Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling the combustion products of a substance so as to be tasted and absorbed into the bloodstream._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Tobacco, in the form of a plug, usually flavored, for chewing rather than smoking._The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling the combustion products of a substance so as to be tasted and absorbed into the bloodstream.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Tobacco, in the form of a plug, usually flavored, for chewing rather than smoking.:The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

Concepts.definition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling the combustion products of a substance so as to be tasted and absorbed into the bloodstream.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Tobacco, in the form of a plug, usually flavored, for chewing rather than smoking.
The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
